title: Tweet from MapleNectar - List of Nerfs for 8.24!
body:
here's the link to the post:

https://twitter.com/RiotMapleNectar/status/1067249776192671745


Looks like Riot will nerf DH. I don't know if its warranted but if Riot says so, that means their data aligns.

Good riddance, Leblanc and Irelia.

I imagine a lot of people are going to be happy to see that champ list. I see a whine thread daily for each of them. Jax, Akali and LeBlanc in particular.


I do think they should reduce the gold from gold plating down to like 120, but oh well.

replies.body: Cant wait for lb mains to complain about nerfs because apparently they cant play her and think she is weak lel

> [{quoted}](name=Fízz v2,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WbpEfUMs,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-27T06:23:19.603+0000)
>
> Cant wait for lb mains to complain about nerfs because apparently they cant play her and think she is weak lel

> [{quoted}](name=TheProfezzor,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WbpEfUMs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-27T05:58:25.715+0000)
>
> Guess I won’t buy coven LB :/

lol

2 people on r/LBMains aren’t “LeBlanc mains”, actually most of us know that the champ is busted and a nerf is warranted.

What we’d like to see is the right nerf though, like reverting the unnecessary buff to W cd and/or nerf the chain length.
is it going to be another 5ms nerf for irelia?
with enough nerfs, it will become a 0 mS champ and be finally balanced, cannot move off the base without tp and flash :D
> Q can now be cast on allied champions and minions and grants a shield that scales with AD, .1s CD.

*Irelia player comes back to game out of bathroom, game having loaded in before hand, other allies already in their lanes.*

"Guys i just need to get to the minions ; ;"
Cant wait for -5ms on jax :D

Aatrox still not performing well in soloQ but still getting nerfed again. Interesting. Ofc there is no lucian on the list why would we nerf adcs with 54-57% winrate from master to diamond with a 40% pickrate who riot forcefully buffed into this bullshit state when we can nerf an irrelevant bruiser who happens to be good in pro play. 

Camille nerfed again. It's not enough to remove her from toplane nah we just gonna kill her. Play your fuckin darius already so viktor, liss, kennen can destroy you. How dare u want a champion being able to deal with this. 
Can riot just powershift camille back into toplane? Camille jungle: cancer with no counterplay.  Camille toplane: lots of counterplay and shitty matchups. 
Give her back her MASSIVELY nerfed E dmg and just tack "deals 50% less dmg to monsters" on every fuckin spell don't care at this point anymore. Just wanna play her toplane without having to play her as second jungle. 

Jax nerf is a joke. Put simply. but he is not lucian so we gonna nerf him anyways. 

Like people talking about how shit adc is yeah i mean lucian surpresses the entire line up like always when he is good but whatever. Riot balance they are paid professionals they know what they do. 

Irelia doesn't need simple straight nerfs irelia needs a rework/powershift. Riot fucked her up with her passive trying to bring her into toplane and instead made her dominate mid AND top. 

Either she is a sustained dmg threat with her passive or a bursty assassin diver but not BOTH.

> Camille nerfed again. It's not enough to remove her from toplane nah we just gonna kill her

Good fucking riddance.

>Can riot just powershift camille back into toplane? Camille jungle: cancer with no counterplay. Camille toplane: lots of counterplay and shitty matchups. Give her back her MASSIVELY nerfed E dmg and just tack "deals 50% less dmg to monsters" on every fuckin spell don't care at this point anymore. Just wanna play her toplane without having to play her as second jungle. 

Tbh, nerfing monster damage wouldn't make much difference since Camille ignores farm most of the time anyway. In fact, an E buff would actually do the exact opposite of what you want because it would make her an even better ganker.

At this rate, I think they need to do some heavy power shuffling on Camille's abilities to get her back in lane. That probably should involve scaling E2 distance to hit her early ganking along with more competitive Q and W ranks. Something has to give on that E distance if we ever expect her to not auto-lose every stat check in top lane.

Still nothing for lucian lmao

classic rito

> Still nothing for lucian lmao

> classic rito

he's shit.

because he's one of two barely playable adc's right now, and he's not even building crit.

And I don't know why salty ADC mains are still allowed (note: there is a difference betwen ADC mains who are ok and salty ADC mains who complain about the game not revolving around them)

It's hard to argue against any of these.

THANK GOD!!! FINALLY A NEW BALANCE TEAM HAS BEEN HIRED AT RIOT!(or so it looks like) I can't tell if this is an offseason april fools joke or are they ACTUALLY nerfing clearly broken champs. oh my i actually almost started crying out of joy.
Source?
its not a new team, ghostcrawler is not the head of balance anymore tho meddler is and thats what hes referring to i think
Oh, yeah.  Ghostcrawer left since early August.  It's been around 109 days since Meddler took over Lead position for League.  Not new, indeed.
GC was never involved in the live balance team...
the lead game designer is pretty much the head of the balance team, and thats what ghostcrawler was and meddler is now

Someone has no idea how game design works. If there was any way for either of us to prove it, I'd wager that GC had nearly nothing to do with live game balance when he was lead designer, but there isn't... so you'll just have to keep on believing your inaccurate misconceptions of the way these types of companies are organized. Have a nice day.
But he was and would frequently voice the reasons behind balance changes
He was comfortable bearing the ire of the community and be the 'face' of the game, something a lot of others weren't. So he took on that role.

No i meant as in we probably have a new balance team cause the current one would never do this. 
sorry if i misled you.
Looking good riot
what does it mean can't proc off procs?
It meant that DH could be proc from luden's echo passive or from liandry DOT for example.

If  Scorch, Ludens and things like that put you below 50% you take the damage. I presume they want to make it the actual ability/auto attack that procs it. Not just get splash damage from a minion wave, Luden's proc and chunk of damage/stack because of it.
-0.25 base HP on Irelia incoming
5% nerf to hp regen per level with a compensation buff that actually makes her stronger for all of lane phase.

I...

...am very happy with this list.

Can't wait for the passive/agressive comment of the whiners here mentionning Irelia -5 MS as to why nerf aren't strong enough, etc.

Even though this list is, in my opinion, kinda spot-on on who is very strong/over the top.

Btw, Dark Harvest will ALSO be nerf in ARAM where soul will only give two instead of five (if I am not mistaken).
INB4 the nerfs are going to be like -5ms...

What needs to be seen:

Turrets buffed; plating no longer gives gold. 100 MR and Armour level 1 each plate increases it by 15. (175 AR/MR once all plates are gone.) A%%%er plates are removed Turrets go to 3k hp. 

Once first turret is destroyed; 150g for first turret. 100 for every after. Goodbye snowball.
There has to be some sort of reward for taking off the plates. I don't agree with the thought that turrets should be basically be invulnerable until 14 minutes like you seem to want.

You're only then buffing late game champions. The reason they did it like this was so that early game champs still get gold even though the longer games are benefiting later game champions. 

I understand you might not be a good laner, but the changes are good overall.
We couldnt play a late game champ in S8.  You cant delete a whole class of champs out of the meta.
1200G first turret. Really healthy for the game.
